example.parse: (IP (PP-LOC (ADVP (AD 纵使)) (PP (P 在) (NP (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (NP-SBJ (NN 胖子)) (VP (NP-LOC (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-ADV (ADJP (JJ 满)) (NP (NN 街))) (VP (VV 走))))) (DEC 的))) (NP-PN (NR 美国))))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (PP (P 像) (NP (NP (PN 她)))) (DP (DT 这) (CLP (M 号))) (DNP (ADJP (JJ 航空母舰级)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 体型))) (VP (ADVP (AD 也)) (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 多见))))
